statements: SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE supplier_id = 101 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003);
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE supplier_id = 5 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) FROM PurchaseOrders GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT MIN(total_amount), MAX(total_amount) FROM PurchaseOrders;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date, supplier_id FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT supplier_id, total_amount, order_id, order_date FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT * FROM supplier_payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount_paid, payment_date, supplier_id FROM supplier_payments;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT po.order_id, po.order_date, sp.amount_paid FROM purchase_orders po JOIN supplier_payments sp ON po.supplier_id = sp.supplier_id WHERE po.order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT po.order_id, po.order_date, sp.amount_paid FROM purchase_orders po LEFT JOIN supplier_payments sp ON po.supplier_id = sp.supplier_id WHERE sp.amount_paid IS NULL
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(amount_paid) AS avg_payment FROM supplier_payments GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING avg_payment > 500 ORDER BY avg_payment DESC
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM PurchaseOrders;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM SupplierPayments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT supplier_id, payment_date FROM SupplierPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers JOIN PurchaseOrders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = PurchaseOrders.order_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierPayments ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierPayments.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_payments > 5000;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Suppliers JOIN PurchaseOrders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = PurchaseOrders.order_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier_details WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_order_amount FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_records WHERE amount_paid > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, method_name FROM supplier_details JOIN payment_methods ON supplier_details.supplier_id = payment_methods.method_id;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier_details WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT order_id, supplier_id, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, payment_date, amount_paid FROM supplier_details JOIN payment_records ON supplier_details.supplier_id = payment_records.supplier_id ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, method_name, method_description FROM payment_methods WHERE method_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, o.quantity_ordered FROM order_items o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.quantity_ordered > 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, supplier_id FROM purchase_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;

SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity_ordered FROM purchase_orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE oi.quantity_ordered > 10 ORDER BY o.order_id ASC;
